Text: Please seed this after you download, I want this as widely spread as possible!

Also, please feel free to put this up anywhere you like.  Spread, spread, spread!  Let's make sure no-one ever has to buy this again for informative purposes, when the only reason to buy a physical copy of this little gem is for sentiment.
Wasn't expecting much from this, but it's quite fascinating -- any chance of a higher resolution version?
